page.title: 01Introduction
page.content: The area stretches North from Mosterton to Littlewindsor in the West,Beaminster in the South and Beaminster Down in the East. It is an area of predominant heavily managed grass land for sheep and cattle,(some 90% of the area). There is a farm shop and a D.I.Y shop in the area and some scattered residential buildings. A few copses of mainly deciduous forest remain on land unsuitable for farming. Our survey concentratesons on, 1)Ecology (there are many species of plant and wild animal in the fields and hedgrows) (2)Homes and Housing (3)Life Style (4)Entertainment and Recreation (5)Education (6)Farming and Employment.
